title: aruNOdayamAnadE
sahitya:
aruNOdayamAnadE manakkuyilE ArvamuDan kUvuvAi Om enrE


anupallavi

  iruLum kavalaiyum illai inimElE idayam tirandaruL udayam polindadu


caraNam    karuNai pirandadu kanavu palittadu kani mukhap-punnakai inimai aLittadu
gurumaNi vAcakam tiruvuDan ezhundu kuvalayam vizhittadu navayugam pirandadu
